referenceObject.reference: Bonaldo, A. B., Bosselaers, J., Ramírez, M. J., Labarque, F. M., Shimano, Y., Silva-Junior, C. J. & Haddad, C. R. (2022). Switching identities: a revision of the Afrotropical spider genus Carteronius Simon, 1897 (Araneae, Corinnidae), senior synonym of Mandaneta Strand, 1932, with a new genus of the Pronophaea group.
